## TextureFormatDecl interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextureFormatDecl 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [filter](./webgl.textureformatdecl.filter.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Format is filterable (other than GL\_NEAREST) |
|  [format](./webgl.textureformatdecl.format.md) | <code>TextureFormat</code> | Base format |
|  [gl2](./webgl.textureformatdecl.gl2.md) | <code>boolean</code> | WebGL 2 only |
|  [num](./webgl.textureformatdecl.num.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of color components |
|  [render](./webgl.textureformatdecl.render.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Format is renderable |
|  [renderExt](./webgl.textureformatdecl.renderext.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Format is renderable via extension |
|  [types](./webgl.textureformatdecl.types.md) | <code>(TextureType &#124; number)[]</code> | Acceptable types and their resulting byte size per pixel. Interleaved layout <code>[format, size, format, size...]</code> |
